item.title: On Anime and Manga アニメ
item.description: If you’d like to skip to a tl;dr on what to know when trying to start watching anime, click here. I’ve noticed a trend with people that enjoy anime. Outside of the more passionate outliers, fans tend to underplay or even omit their love for the genre until someone else brings it up.
